channel.title: Other players, unable to connect
channel.description:
Ok, so I have been running a server for about a month/month and a half maybe, it all works fine, players can connect to it and play and whatnot. One day, I get new internet security, and I have to uninstall McAfee to put it on. So I uninstall mcafee and winamp. I install Kaspersky Internet Security, and all the sudden no one can connect to my server. I wonder if it's Kaspersky firewall or what, but nothing notifies me when i open up the runserver so I don't think thats it. I have the latest java updates for jre and jdk.. I'm out of ideas, can anyone suggest anything?
P.S: A new source will not work, already tried it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 03:20:05 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? Anyone at all?

item.title: Other players, unable to connect
item.dc:creator: @Ram1500 Ram1500
item.description:
@Ram1500 wrote:

Ok, so I have been running a server for about a month/month and a half maybe, it all works fine, players can connect to it and play and whatnot. One day, I get new internet security, and I have to uninstall McAfee to put it on. So I uninstall mcafee and winamp. I install Kaspersky Internet Security, and all the sudden no one can connect to my server. I wonder if it’s Kaspersky firewall or what, but nothing notifies me when i open up the runserver so I don’t think thats it. I have the latest java updates for jre and jdk… I’m out of ideas, can anyone suggest anything?

P.S: A new source will not work, already tried it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 21, 2008, 03:20:05 PM[/size][hr]Anyone? Anyone at all?
